mention.text: Milken , the former head of Drexel 's Beverly Hills , Calif.-based junk bond department
a $ 6 billion civil lawsuit accusing Michael Milken and other former Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc. officials of fraudulently peddling junk bonds in the 1980s
unsuitable investments for savings and loan institutions
an independent institution that made its own investment decisions , often in disagreement with Milken
Drexel , which is now in federal bankruptcy court proceedings
The lawsuit by Columbia , filed in U.S. District Court in Los Angeles , names Milken , nine other Drexel officials and more than 100 investment partnerships

Milken and others of manipulating the junk bond market , giving bribes and stock investment opportunities to some thrift executives , misappropriating valuable stock interests in junk bond deals , skimming profits from junk bond trading , and controlling through illegal

others of manipulating the junk bond market , giving bribes and stock investment opportunities to some thrift executives , misappropriating valuable stock interests in junk bond deals , skimming profits from junk bond trading , and controlling through illegal
a total face value of $ 4.3 billion
